NavigationCurrentEntryChangeEvent.summary: The NavigationCurrentEntryChangeEvent interface of the {{domxref("Navigation API", "Navigation API", "", "nocode")}} is the event object for the event, which fires when the has changed.

remarks.para: This event will fire for same-document navigations (e.g. or ), replacements (i.e. a call with history set to replace), or other calls that change the entry's state (e.g. , or the {{domxref("History API", "History API", "", "nocode")}}'s ).

This event fires after the navigation is committed, meaning that the visible URL has changed and the update has occurred. It is useful for migrating from usage of older API features like the or events.

-Modern client-side routing: the Navigation API
-Navigation API explainer
-Domenic Denicola's Navigation API live demo
